body.p:
IN THE NAME AND BY THE AUTHORITY OF
The Commonwealth of Kentucky,
KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
THOMAS E. BRAMLETTE,
GOVERNOR OF SAID COMMONWEALTH.
To all whom these Presents shall come, Greeting:

Know Ye, That reposing especial trust and confidence in the integrity, diligence, and ability of Delos T. Bligh, I do hereby appoint him AGENT, on the part of this State, to proceed to the State of Indiana for the purpose of demanding and receiving from the proper authorities of said State, of Indiana, a Fugitive from Justice from the State of Kentucky, charged with Felony, and I do hereby authorize and direct the said Delos T. Bligh to demand and receive the said Fugitive, bring him to this State, and deliver him to the custody of the Jailor of the county of Jefferson State of Kentucky

In Testimony Whereof, I have caused these letters to be made patent and the Seal of the Commowealth to be hereunto affixed. Done at Frankfort, the 10th day of September, in the year of our Lord, on thousand eight hundred and 63, and in the 70th year of the Commonwealth.

BY THE GOVERNOR: Tho E Bramlette
E L VanWinkle, Secretary of State.
SEAL OF KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Commonwealth Office -- WM. E. HUGHESs, State Printer.
This Day D. T. Bligh agent herein mentioned Delivered to me the person of Crestian Hofner as being the fugitive herein mentioned
Wm E Thomas Jailer of Jefferson County, Ky
